title: Regional distribution of social network users worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of social media users in the y axis.
The Share of social media users is highest at Country East Asia and lowest at Country Central Asia.
The highest Country East Asia has 32.0 more Share of social media users than the lowest Country Central Asia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of social media users for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Share of social media users 33.0 is found at Country East Asia and the minimum is found at Central Asia where Country is 1.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of social media users for 12 number of Countrys.
Country East Asia has the highest Share of social media users and Central Asia has the lowest Share of social media users.
Second maximum Share of social media users is found at Country Southeast Asia.

Country South America, and South Asia have a similar Share of social media users that is 9.0.
